function btApplyMap:getClass(className)
    if self.classPath and self.classPath[className] then
        local c =  require_path(className, self.classPath[className])
        return c:new()
    else
        BattleLog.error("btApplyMap 文件 没有配置  ",className ," 数据 ")
    end
end

return btApplyMap
